item.title: JVM signal processing part 1
item.description: Objective Simple demo code for JVM signal processing. Review the setup and configuration for different signal processing engines. Target Audience JVM Developers new to modern signal processing frameworks and tooling Source Documents physionet QRS complex First-Derivative Based QRS Detection Algorithm Shannon energy Shannon energy non linearConvolution Convolution Filters Scala Breeze Java Colt Projec Scala Demo app for First-Derivative Based QRS Detection Algorithm Summary Use First-Derivative Based QRS Detection Algorithm implemented in Scala Breeze for detecting R-R inteval of a ECG signal
